name: Rewind This
description:
Rewind This Description

A tower defense where you use rewind mechanics to capture your actions to create clones of yourself to defeat waves of evil DVDs. Made during Brackeys Jam 2020.2.

Controls 
  1. R key - Create a copy of yourself that continuously rewinds and plays back your actions for the last 4 seconds. Requires $100 to perform.
  2. WASD keys - Movement.
  3. Left mouse button - Fire at cursor.
